message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm confident we can meet in the middle on this one.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $12,000.  How about we meet halfway and settle on $16,000? It's a fair price considering the true value of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm thinking $13,500 is a fair price for this product, considering its value and what I've learned about it so far.
